section.title: Data::DataKey Struct Reference

para.para: This structure works like a std::pair but its member names are meaningful and are used to store data paired to a particular key.

listitem.para: The key used to find the data associated.

section.section:
Detailed Description
This structure works like a std::pair but its member names are meaningful and are used to store data paired to a particular key.
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: include/headers/data.h
